title: Someone analyse this please?
body:
Trying to figure out what else i need to get an S+ with {{champion:32}} in jg.
Only just learning jg role, this game everything was just going right. I visited all lanes frequently, while keeping my CS going well.
Ganked all lanes and scored a solo kill in each, and bailed on 15 others to hand a kill over to a team mate. Didnt die once, took a baron and 3 dragons. Helped with a couple towers and inhibs, second highest CS in the game... and only an S. What more can i do?
(besides winning more, ignore that poor ratio lol)

Also side note, out Jinx only got an A. Not an A+, just a standard A haha **feelsbadman**

http://puu.sh/rsT28/4505fc1728.jpg

replies.body: Remember it also compares you with other people on the server who play amu and since he's a pretty popular pick you gotta expect a lot of good players with him so I guess you just gotta keep improving, and remember to constanly ward!
I don't think thats true regarding the comparison to other players,  I think with only an 18 out of 35 C/kill and cs amount is what didn't net him the S+

It is true. You mastery score is made of your kill participation, KDA, cs, objective participation (Drag, Baron, towers, inhibs) *and* rated against everyone else, of all levels, on the server playing that same champ you're on at around that same time. 
Want better scores? Play during off-peak hours when there's less people on.
DIED TOO MUCH
Have you warded frequently?
i placed 10 wards..

> [{quoted}](name=Sloth Almighty,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=TyzuugLr,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-10-01T01:32:14.387+0000)
>
> i placed 10 wards..

should have 15 at 30 min minumum

so you were about 3-4 wards behind
Can't you just buy sight stone and just spam wards in the fountain if you were a support?
ok cool.. never knew wards counted to your performance. good to know

I believe they do :) 

I'm quite a low elo, but I've noticed that many pro constantly buy pink wards, which is something many players don't do in games. They cost relatively little and they DO improve your score

You should have taken those  kills after all, there are so many AP tank Amumus getting really high kills and assists. Don't forget that S rank is based partially on how other people have fared with the same champion or try leaving fights near death more? Only if it's appropriate though! It might have had something to do with how much damage you contributed too.

> [{quoted}](name=AlliehZorfvant,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=TyzuugLr,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2016-10-01T22:19:24.184+0000)
>
> You should have taken those  kills after all, there are so many AP tank Amumus getting really high kills and assists. Don't forget that S rank is based partially on how other people have fared with the same champion or try leaving fights near death more? Only if it's appropriate though! It might have had something to do with how much damage you contributed too.

That could be why, the damage thing. My aim that game was to get all 3 lanes ahead with kills, which is why I merely wanted to hold the enemy laners arms behind their back while my team mate wailed on them to death. Majority of assists I left the fight with >50% health, when I knew the kill was safely secured by my team mate. So yeah, I didn't deal huge damage at all really

> [{quoted}](name=Sloth Almighty,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=TyzuugLr,comment-id=00070000,timestamp=2016-10-02T21:27:51.227+0000)

> That could be why, the damage thing. My aim that game was to get all 3 lanes ahead with kills, which is why I merely wanted to hold the enemy laners arms behind their back while my team mate wailed on them to death. Majority of assists I left the fight with >50% health, when I knew the kill was safely secured by my team mate. So yeah, I didn't deal huge damage at all really

I like using static if my team's really fed and ahead just so I can get a cheap S rank. If it suits!

???
I played Jinx 2 days ago and got an S on Jinx and only went 6/1/7.
She mustn't of helped with objectives or something.
33/15/25 479cs 720k total damage as jinxy boo #LVL7Gang
Well she helped with dragon twice, and took her bot towers. She got ripped hard core

I have no idea how she didn't get an S then.
Maybe the difficulty for Jinx S'es shot up in the past few days
She didn't get an S because her farm is poo, she has 150 at 27mins which is a farm rate of below 50% which is terrible, jinx is not even getting 3 out 6 minions per wave.
You built 2 IBG, that's why it's only S

> [{quoted}](name=Justice4Harambe,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=TyzuugLr,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2016-10-01T05:35:06.954+0000)
>
> You built 2 IBG, that's why it's only S

IBG?

> IBG?

Ice Born Gauntlet, and you have two of them hehe xd

And yeah as im sure you know by now the grading system matches you up against other players playing the same champion in the same role. While yes your gameplay of amumu was exemplary, there was probably some other guy out there who got that extra kill early, or cleared his camps a bit quicker, or placed a bunch more wards, or didnt buy two of the same item and was able to power spike quicker and do better etc. Therefore you got the S, still doing very well, but not well enough to be the best of the best.

This is also why its SUUUUPER easy to get high S rankings on champions in off roles. play Kindred support and just dont feed, bang easy S rank (at least from what ive found) There are so little games to compare to that chances are your average off meta game was probably one of the highest played yadda yadda.

anyways tldr, there was probably some other games in whence players did just a teency wheency bit better than you did, and made smarter item choices haha.

Some champions are much harder to get S with than other, and Amumu is one of them _(due to the amount of people who do well with him)_

I can tell you that Deaths and CS have the most to do with getting an S, CS especially. 

this is a Yorick game of mine:

http://imgur.com/a/1nfUy

As you can see, you don't need a positive KDA to get an S... But look at the CS...

It really helps if you have friends, I have a good friend who is very good with Amumu, he very rarely ends a game without a perfect score, and he just couldn't get an S. So I picked Shen, and another good friend picked Zilean, and every time Amumu got into trouble, i would just ult him, and Zilean would try to be near as well with his ult. So he was near impossible to kill him, and once he got a few kills ahead, he would just farm up. And he got his lvl 6.

We did the same with Evelynn for another friend, he gets games like 15/3 often, and gets A. So i played Azir _(who has enough Peel to get anyone low enough for eve to jump in and take the kill)_ and my other friend played Ashe, _(because theres nothing eve can't do against an enemy thats stunned for 3.5 seconds... and that friend is a god at landing cross-map arrows.)_ And he got his lvl 6 too. 

Also the longer the game goes, the easier it is to get an S. Any time under 25 mins is near impossible, 30/40 mins is more possible, and once you are 50/60 mins, you should have enough farm _(if you are focusing on that)_ to get S without problem.

So my advice would be gank less, play selfishly, farm up like mad _(i got my final lvl 7 S on Taliyah by getting 698 farm. It was an hour long game and I participated in 0 team fights)_ and get friends to be your bodyguards. 

Good luck! :)

This sounds counter productive for winning the game, but given the way the game was going, i could have quit helping at the 15min mark and just farmed for 10mins.
Sounds like CS is my key though, thanks for the tip

Winning plays no part in getting an S or not. So if you want an S sometimes you gotta play selfish and lose a game or two. 
(not in ranked of course)

But yea CS is key

here is some data that i find confusing though, apparently my game play was better than the expected amu games

http://puu.sh/rtwpU/f39d285a14.png

http://puu.sh/rtwv4/3c40d2943c.png
